Package photos

Class AddPhotoController

java.lang.Object
photos.AddPhotoController
public class AddPhotoController extends Object
Controller for the AddPhoto scene, dealing with adding a photo to an album.
Author:
Prajit Kundu, Howard Luo

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the scene.

    • addPhoto

      public void addPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Adds the photo to the currently open album. This method will display a pop-up error if there is an issue in adding the photo, such as the photo already being in the album, invalid tags, illegal input, etc. Otherwise, a confirmation pop-up appears, and the photo is added after this confirmation is accepted.
      Parameters:
      event - the Add button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • cancel

      public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Cancels the adding operation and changes the scene back to the currently opened album menu
      Parameters:
      event - clicking on the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • switchToOpenAlbum

      public void switchToOpenAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches the scene back to OpenAlbum.
      Parameters:
      event - an event that triggers a cancellation of the add
      Throws:
      IOException
